member.name: T:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType
member.summary: Converter test types. These are used to condition error messages down to warnings.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.ConverterTestTypeUnknown
member.summary: Internal-only: displayed when a string cannot be converted to an ConverterTestType.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.XmlException
member.summary: Displayed when an XML loading exception has occurred.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.WhitespacePrecedingNodeWrong
member.summary: Displayed when the whitespace preceding a node is wrong.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.WhitespacePrecedingEndElementWrong
member.summary: Displayed when the whitespace preceding an end element is wrong.

members.member: Before this point, ignore errors on convert operation

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.DeclarationPresent
member.summary: Displayed when the XML declaration is present in the source file.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.UnauthorizedAccessException
member.summary: Displayed when a file cannot be accessed; typically when trying to save back a fixed file.

members.member: After this point, ignore errors on format operation

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.XmlnsMissing
member.summary: Displayed when the xmlns attribute is missing from the document element.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.XmlnsValueWrong
member.summary: Displayed when the xmlns attribute on the document element is wrong.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.DeprecatedLocalizationVariablePrefixInTextValue
member.summary: Displayed when inner text contains a deprecated $(loc.xxx) reference.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.DeprecatedLocalizationVariablePrefixInAttributeValue
member.summary: Displayed when an attribute value contains a deprecated $(loc.xxx) reference.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.AssignAnonymousFileId
member.summary: Assign an identifier to a File element when on Id attribute is specified.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.SuppressSignatureVerificationObsolete
member.summary: SuppressSignatureVerification attribute is obsolete and corresponding functionality removed.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.WixCABinaryIdRenamed
member.summary: WixCA Binary/@Id has been renamed to UtilCA.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.QuietExecCustomActionsRenamed
member.summary: QtExec custom actions have been renamed.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.QtExecCmdTimeoutAmbiguous
member.summary: QtExecCmdTimeout was previously used for both CAQuietExec and CAQuietExec64. For WixQuietExec, use WixQuietExecCmdTimeout. For WixQuietExec64, use WixQuietExec64CmdTimeout.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.AssignDirectoryNameFromShortName
member.summary: Directory/@ShortName may only be specified with Directory/@Name.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.BootstrapperApplicationDataDeprecated
member.summary: BootstrapperApplicationData attribute is deprecated and replaced with Unreal for MSI. Use BundleCustomData element for Bundles.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.AssignPermissionExInheritable
member.summary: Inheritable is new and is now defaulted to 'yes' which is a change in behavior for all but children of CreateFolder.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.ColumnCategoryCamelCase
member.summary: Column element's Category attribute is camel-case.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.ColumnModularizeCamelCase
member.summary: Column element's Modularize attribute is camel-case.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.InnerTextDeprecated
member.summary: Inner text value should move to an attribute.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.AutoGuidUnnecessary
member.summary: Explicit auto-GUID unnecessary.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.FeatureAbsentAttributeReplaced
member.summary: The Feature Absent attribute renamed to AllowAbsent.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.FeatureAllowAdvertiseValueDeprecated
member.summary: The Feature AllowAdvertise attribute value deprecated.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.PublishConditionOneUnnecessary
member.summary: The Condition='1' attribute is unnecessary on Publish elements.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.AssignBootstrapperApplicationDpiAwareness
member.summary: DpiAwareness is new and is defaulted to 'perMonitorV2' which is a change in behavior.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.AssignVariableTypeFormatted
member.summary: The string variable type was previously treated as formatted.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.CustomActionKeysAreNowRefs
member.summary: The CustomAction attributes have been renamed from BinaryKey and FileKey to BinaryRef and FileRef.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.ProductAndPackageRenamed
member.summary: The Product and Package elements have been renamed and reorganized.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.ModuleAndPackageRenamed
member.summary: The Module and Package elements have been renamed and reorganized.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.DefaultMediaTemplate
member.summary: A MediaTemplate with no attributes set is now provided by default.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.UtilRegistryValueSearchBehaviorChange
member.summary: util:RegistrySearch has breaking change when value is missing.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.DisplayInternalUiNotConvertable
member.summary: DisplayInternalUI can't be converted.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.InstallerVersionBehaviorChange
member.summary: InstallerVersion has breaking change when omitted.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.VerbTargetNotConvertable
member.summary: Verb/@Target can't be converted.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.BootstrapperApplicationDll
member.summary: The bootstrapper application dll is now specified in its own element.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.BootstrapperApplicationDllRequired
member.summary: The new bootstrapper application dll element is required.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.BalUseUILanguagesDeprecated
member.summary: bal:UseUILanguages is deprecated, 'true' is now the standard behavior.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.BalBootstrapperApplicationRefToElement
member.summary: The custom elements for built-in BAs are now required.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.RenameExePackageCommandToArguments
member.summary: The ExePackage elements "XxxCommand" attributes have been renamed to "XxxArguments".

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.Win64AttributeRenamed
member.summary: The Win64 attribute has been renamed. Use the Bitness attribute instead.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.Win64AttributeRenameCannotBeAutomatic
member.summary: Breaking change: The Win64 attribute's value '{0}' cannot be converted automatically to the new Bitness attribute.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.TagElementRenamed
member.summary: The Tag element has been renamed. Use the element 'SoftwareTag' name.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.IntegratedDependencyNamespace
member.summary: The Dependency namespace has been incorporated into WiX v4 namespace.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.RemoveUnusedNamespaces
member.summary: Remove unused namespaces.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.RemotePayloadRenamed
member.summary: The Remote element has been renamed. Use the "XxxPackagePayload" element instead.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.NameAttributeMovedToRemotePayload
member.summary: The XxxPackage/@Name attribute must be specified on the child XxxPackagePayload element when using a remote payload.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.CompressedAttributeUnnecessaryForRemotePayload
member.summary: The XxxPackage/@Compressed attribute should not be specified when using a remote payload.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.DownloadUrlAttributeMovedToRemotePayload
member.summary: The XxxPackage/@DownloadUrl attribute must be specified on the child XxxPackagePayload element when using a remote payload.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.BurnHashAlgorithmChanged
member.summary: The hash algorithm used for bundles changed from SHA1 to SHA512.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.CustomTableNotAlwaysConvertable
member.summary: CustomTable elements can't always be converted.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.CustomTableRef
member.summary: CustomTable elements that don't contain the table definition are now CustomTableRef.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.RegistryKeyActionObsolete
member.summary: The RegistryKey element's Action attribute is obsolete.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.TagRefElementRenamed
member.summary: The TagRef element has been renamed. Use the element 'SoftwareTagRef' name.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.SoftwareTagLicensedObsolete
member.summary: The SoftwareTag element's Licensed attribute is obsolete.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.SoftwareTagTypeObsolete
member.summary: The SoftwareTag element's Type attribute is obsolete.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.TargetDirDeprecated
member.summary: TARGETDIR directory should no longer be explicitly defined.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.DefiningStandardDirectoryDeprecated
member.summary: Standard directories should no longer be defined using the Directory element.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.ReferencesReplaced
member.summary: Naked UI, custom action, and property references replaced with elements.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.BundlePackageCacheAttributeValueObsolete
member.summary: Cache attribute value updated.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.MsuPackageKBObsolete
member.summary: The MsuPackage element contains obsolete '{0}' attribute. Windows no longer supports silently removing MSUs so the attribute is unnecessary. The attribute will be removed.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.MsuPackagePermanentObsolete
member.summary: The MsuPackage element contains obsolete '{0}' attribute. MSU packages are now always permanent because Windows no longer supports silently removing MSUs. The attribute will be removed.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.MoveNamespacesToRoot
member.summary: Namespace should be defined on the root. The '{0}' namespace was move to the root element.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.CustomActionIdsIncludePlatformSuffix
member.summary: Custom action ids have changed in WiX v4 extensions. Because WiX v4 has platform-specific custom actions, the platform is applied as a suffix: _X86, _X64, _A64 (Arm64). When manually rescheduling custom actions, you must use the new custom action id, with platform suffix.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.StandardDirectoryRefDeprecated
member.summary: The {0} directory should no longer be explicitly referenced. Remove the DirectoryRef element with Id attribute '{0}'.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.EmptyStandardDirectoryRefNotConvertable
member.summary: Referencing '{0}' directory directly is no longer supported. The DirectoryRef will not be removed but you will probably need to reference a more specific directory.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.WixMbaPrereqLicenseUrlDeprecated
member.summary: The magic WixVariable 'WixMbaPrereqLicenseUrl' has been removed. Add bal:PrereqLicenseUrl="yes" to a prereq package instead.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.WixMbaPrereqPackageIdDeprecated
member.summary: The magic WixVariable 'WixMbaPrereqPackageId' has been removed. Add bal:PrereqPackage="yes" to the target package instead.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.TargetDirRefRemoved
member.summary: A reference to the TARGETDIR Directory was removed. This can cause unintended side effects. See the conversion FAQ for more information: https://wixtoolset.org/docs/fourthree/faqs/#converting-packages

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.CertificateBinaryKeyIsNowBinaryRef
member.summary: The Certificate BinaryKey element has been renamed to BinaryRef.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.RelatedBundleActionLowercase
member.summary: The RelatedBundle element's Action attribute value must now be all lowercase. The Action='{0}' will be converted to '{1}'

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.WixUIPrintEulaCustomAction
member.summary: The WixUIPrintEula custom action has been replaced with the MSI native MsiPrint control event in WiX v5 and no longer needs to be authored in a custom dialog set.

member.name: F:WixToolset.Converters.WixConverter.ConverterTestType.RelatedBundleIdAttributeRenamed
member.summary: The RelatedBundle element's Id attribute has been renamed. Use the Code attribute instead."

member.name: T:WixToolset.Converters.WixToolsetCoreServiceProviderExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for adding Converters services.

member.name: M:WixToolset.Converters.WixToolsetCoreServiceProviderExtensions.AddConverter(WixToolset.Extensibility.Services.IWixToolsetCoreServiceProvider)
member.summary: Adds Converters services.
